plot: The documentary examines the themes of war and peace - successively - in the art of Picasso, and then shows how all past elements are present in the major work, War and Peace.
title: Guerra e pace
plot_es: The documentary examines the themes of war and peace - successively - in the art of Picasso, and then shows how all past elements are present in the major work, War and Peace.
plot_en: The documentary examines the themes of war and peace - successively - in the art of Picasso, and then shows how all past elements are present in the major work, War and Peace.
